definition: fortunately/luckily/(sarcastic) fancy that, how fortunate!
deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: Also the Kui gets thus, otherwise, really fear that that horse will accept to can not stand them.
sentences.chinese: 也亏得如此，不然，真怕那匹马会承受不了他们。

sentences.english: First, people have more to lose.
Thanks to everybody's help, we finished the job on time.
sentences.chinese: 亏得大家帮忙，我们才按时把这活干完。

sentences.english: Back in time scold go jin jing kui tang sugar.
sentences.chinese: 亏得唐糖及时回来骂走了金晶。

sentences.english: Luckily, you reminded me, otherwise I would have missed the train.
sentences.chinese: 亏得你提醒了我，否则我就赶不上火车了。

sentences.english: Someday, someone is going to thank you for having let me go.
sentences.chinese: 会有那么一天，有人要感谢你，亏得你放走了我。

sentences.english: But Emmy had always been good and attentive to him.
sentences.chinese: 还亏得埃米总是对他很和蔼很殷勤。

sentences.english: Fancy a big boy like you not understanding such a simple thing!
sentences.chinese: 亏得你长这么大，那么点事儿都不懂。

definition: luckily/fortunately
fortunately/luckily
thanks to/luckily
if it were not for/but for
were it not for/if not for
fortunately
to cause or lead to sth bad
deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
actually/as it turns out/indeed/of course
otherwise/or else/or
erhua variant of 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]
hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
I'm afraid that.../perhaps/maybe/very likely
to speculate/to ponder
No wonder!/not surprising
it'd be a wonder if... (following a verb phrase that is usually negative)
